entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 70 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
